org.cloudgraph.hbase.service

Interface ServiceContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LazyServiceContext, SimpleServiceContext

    public interface ServiceContext
    Holds temporary state information for use within services held for the duration of a service call. For most implementations the <close method must be called within the finally block of the service method to free associated resources.
    Since:
    0.6.3
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond
     

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Frees any resources associated with this context.
      StateMarshalingContext getMarshallingContext()
      Returns the state marshalling context associated with the context.
